title: on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 

(Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road traffic road act 2023 (commencement) (no 3) order 2024

title: on me by section 1(2) of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023),
heading: 2. The 1st day of October 2024 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of October 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 
14(c) of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal 
 1 October, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [497] 3
